CustomField.description: Defines if pay transactions with Total Including Tax of 0 or a negative value will be included during invoice creation. If No pay transactions with negative or 0 total pay values will not be included in invoices.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if pay transactions with Total Including Tax of 0 or a negative value will be included during invoice creation. If No pay transactions with negative or 0 total pay values will not be included in invoices.
CustomField.label: 0 & Negative Pay Transactions Invoiced
